nodes.text: The Quamar system was located in the Bruanii sector, a part of the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. The super-hyperroute known as the Corellian Trade Spine linked it to the Mugaar system as well as the Jiroch system in the Yushan sector. The Quamar system shared its name with the luxury liner Quamar Messenger.
The Quamar system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square K-17.
